# Custom Instructions: API Upsert Components

- When updating the API upsert PowerShell script, workflow, or node helper scripts, review the Alternative Actions Marketplace client documentation (installation section): https://github.com/devops-actions/alternative-github-actions-marketplace/blob/main/src/backend/README.md#installation
- Ensure any changes remain compatible with the documented client usage and installation requirements.
